definitions.definition: A means, attitude or position of defense.
Performed so as to minimise risk.
Displaying an inordinate sensitivity to criticism or intrusion.
Of a bowling or fielding tactic designed to prevent the other side from scoring runs; of a batting tactic designed to prevent being out.
Pertaining to defense, as opposed to attack.
definitions.example: The victim held up his hand to repel the attacker and received a defensive knife wound.

definitions.definition: In a state or posture of defense.
